value.title: StarCraft 2: The SMARTEST & DUMBEST Strategy!

value.title: StarCraft 2: DIAMOND LEAGUE CRINGE! (Viewer Game)
value.excerpt: A cringy game of Diamond League StarCraft 2. In this match between CmdrJay and AmarthDagnir we see the Terran player focus on lots of different kinds of cheese. While it starts with a Bunker Rush we quickly realise that it won't win him the game so he transitions towards something even more cheeky.

value.title: StarCraft 2: REYNOR PLAYING PROTOSS?! (Bly vs Reynor)
value.excerpt: Since there are not a lot of big offline tournaments on the horizon, a few SC2 pro gamers have decided to rank up their offraces over the last week or two in StarCraft 2. In the case of Reynor, one of the best Zerg players in the world, he has been playing a significant amount of Protoss and also Terran.
